CANopen Object Dictionary Documenation for emotas_CANopen_Slave


Index:       0x1000 - Device Type
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This objects contains the CANopen device type of the device.
  Sub:          0x00 - Device Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1001 - Error Register
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This object contains a register of 8 error information bits.
  Sub:          0x00 - Error Register
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   4

Index:       0x1005 - COB ID SYNC
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This object shall indicate the configured COB-ID of the synchronization object (SYNC). Further, it defines whether the CANopen device generates the SYNC.
  Sub:          0x00 - COB ID SYNC
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x00000080
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1006 - Communication Cycle Period
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This object shall provide the communication cycle period. This period defines the SYNC interval.

The value shall be given in multiple of 탎. If the value is set to 0x00000000  the transmission of SYNC messages shall be disabled. By changing the value from 0x00000000 and the synchronous counter overflow value is greater than 0 the first SYNC message shall start with the counter value reset to 1.

The transmission of SYNC messages shall start within one communication cycle period as given by the value after it is set to the new value.

  Sub:          0x00 - Communication Cycle Period
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 100000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1008 - Manufacturer device name
DataType:    VISIBLE_STRING
ObjectCode:  Variable
  Sub:          0x00 - Manufacturer device name
  DataType:     VISIBLE_STRING
  DefaultValue: simple emotas CANopen slave for evaluation
  AccessType:   const
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1014 - COB ID EMCY
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This object shall indicate the configured COB-ID for the EMCY write service.

  Sub:          0x00 - COB ID EMCY
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x80
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1015 - Inhibit Time Emergency
DataType:    UNSIGNED16
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: This object shall indicate the configured inhibit time for the EMCY message. The value shall be given in multiples of 100 탎. The value 0 shall disable the inhibit time.

  Sub:          0x00 - Inhibit Time Emergency
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1016 - Consumer Heartbeat Time
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Array
  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 3
  AccessType:   const
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Consumer Heartbeat Time 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x10000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Consumer Heartbeat Time 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x20000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Consumer Heartbeat Time 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x30000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1017 - Producer Heartbeat Time
DataType:    UNSIGNED16
ObjectCode:  Variable
Description: The producer heartbeat time shall indicate the configured cycle time of the heartbeat produced by the device.

The value shall be given in multiples of 1 ms. The value 0 shall disable the producer heartbeat.

  Sub:          0x00 - Producer Heartbeat Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 1000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1018 - Identity Object
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This objects contains the identity information of the device.

  Sub:          0x00 - Number of entries
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 4
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Vendor Id
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x319
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Product Code
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0815
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Revision number
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x00010001
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Serial number
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 1
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1028 - Emergency Consumer
DataType:    UNSIGNED32
ObjectCode:  Array
Description: This objects indicates the configured COB-IDs for the EMCY objects that the CANopen device is consuming.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 3
  AccessType:   const
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - EMCY Consumer 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0081
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - EMCY Consumer 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0082
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - EMCY Consumer 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0083
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1200 - SDO server parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 2
  AccessType:   const
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB-ID client to server
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x600
  AccessType:   const
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - COB-ID server to client
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x580
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1400 - Receive PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 5
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x200
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the reception character of the RPDO. 
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. It is not allowed to change the value while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b). 
The RPDO may use the time implementation specific.

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer. The RPDO may use the time for deadline monitoring. The deadline monitoring is activated within the next reception of an RPDO after configuring the event-timer. A timeout results in an indication to the local application.


Index:       0x1401 - Receive PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 5
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x300
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the reception character of the RPDO. 
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. It is not allowed to change the value while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b). 
The RPDO may use the time implementation specific.

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer. The RPDO may use the time for deadline monitoring. The deadline monitoring is activated within the next reception of an RPDO after configuring the event-timer. A timeout results in an indication to the local application.


Index:       0x1402 - Receive PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 5
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x400
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the reception character of the RPDO. 
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. It is not allowed to change the value while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b). 
The RPDO may use the time implementation specific.

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer. The RPDO may use the time for deadline monitoring. The deadline monitoring is activated within the next reception of an RPDO after configuring the event-timer. A timeout results in an indication to the local application.


Index:       0x1403 - Receive PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 5
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x500
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the reception character of the RPDO. 
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. It is not allowed to change the value while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b). 
The RPDO may use the time implementation specific.

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer. The RPDO may use the time for deadline monitoring. The deadline monitoring is activated within the next reception of an RPDO after configuring the event-timer. A timeout results in an indication to the local application.


Index:       0x1600 - Receive PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1601 - Receive PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1602 - Receive PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1603 - Receive PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to receive.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1800 - Transmit PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 6
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x80000180
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the transmission type  of the TPDO. 
0 .. synchronous (acyclic)
1 .. synchronous (every SYNC)
2 .. synchronous (every 2nd SYNC)
240 .. synchronous (every 240th SYNC)

254 .. event-driven (manufacturer-specific)
255 .. event-driven (profile-specific)
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The time is the minimum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to FEh and FF h . The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b ).

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The time is the maximum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to 254 and 255 . The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer.

  Sub:          0x06 - SYNC start value
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x06 contains the SYNC start value. The SYNC start value of 0 shall indicate that  the counter of the SYNC message shall not be processed for this PDO. The SYNC start value 1 to 240 shall indicate that the counter of the SYNC message shall be processed for this PDO. In case the counter of the SYNC message is not enableds ub-index 0x06 shall be ignored.

 The SYNC message of which the counter value equals the SYNC start value
shall be regarded as the first received SYNC message. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01 h is set to 0 b ).


Index:       0x1801 - Transmit PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 6
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x80000280
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the transmission type  of the TPDO. 
0 .. synchronous (acyclic)
1 .. synchronous (every SYNC)
2 .. synchronous (every 2nd SYNC)
240 .. synchronous (every 240th SYNC)

254 .. event-driven (manufacturer-specific)
255 .. event-driven (profile-specific)
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The time is the minimum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to FEh and FF h . The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b ).

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The time is the maximum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to 254 and 255 . The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer.

  Sub:          0x06 - SYNC start value
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x06 contains the SYNC start value. The SYNC start value of 0 shall indicate that  the counter of the SYNC message shall not be processed for this PDO. The SYNC start value 1 to 240 shall indicate that the counter of the SYNC message shall be processed for this PDO. In case the counter of the SYNC message is not enableds ub-index 0x06 shall be ignored.

 The SYNC message of which the counter value equals the SYNC start value
shall be regarded as the first received SYNC message. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01 h is set to 0 b ).


Index:       0x1802 - Transmit PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 6
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x80000380
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the transmission type  of the TPDO. 
0 .. synchronous (acyclic)
1 .. synchronous (every SYNC)
2 .. synchronous (every 2nd SYNC)
240 .. synchronous (every 240th SYNC)

254 .. event-driven (manufacturer-specific)
255 .. event-driven (profile-specific)
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The time is the minimum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to FEh and FF h . The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b ).

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The time is the maximum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to 254 and 255 . The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer.

  Sub:          0x06 - SYNC start value
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x06 contains the SYNC start value. The SYNC start value of 0 shall indicate that  the counter of the SYNC message shall not be processed for this PDO. The SYNC start value 1 to 240 shall indicate that the counter of the SYNC message shall be processed for this PDO. In case the counter of the SYNC message is not enableds ub-index 0x06 shall be ignored.

 The SYNC message of which the counter value equals the SYNC start value
shall be regarded as the first received SYNC message. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01 h is set to 0 b ).


Index:       0x1803 - Transmit PDO Communication Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the communication parameters for the PDO the CANopen device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 6
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - COB ID
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: $NODEID+0x80000480
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Transmission Type
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 254
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x2 defines the transmission type  of the TPDO. 
0 .. synchronous (acyclic)
1 .. synchronous (every SYNC)
2 .. synchronous (every 2nd SYNC)
240 .. synchronous (every 240th SYNC)

254 .. event-driven (manufacturer-specific)
255 .. event-driven (profile-specific)
  Sub:          0x03 - Inhibit Time
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description: Sub-index 0x03 contains the inhibit time. The time is the minimum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to FEh and FF h . The value is defined as multiple of 100 탎. The value of 0 shall disable the inhibit time. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01h is set to 0 b ).

  Sub:          0x05 - Event Timer
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x05 contains the event-timer. The time is the maximum interval for PDO
transmission if the transmission type is set to 254 and 255 . The value is defined as multiple of 1 ms. The value of 0 shall disable the event-timer.

  Sub:          0x06 - SYNC start value
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Description:  Sub-index 0x06 contains the SYNC start value. The SYNC start value of 0 shall indicate that  the counter of the SYNC message shall not be processed for this PDO. The SYNC start value 1 to 240 shall indicate that the counter of the SYNC message shall be processed for this PDO. In case the counter of the SYNC message is not enableds ub-index 0x06 shall be ignored.

 The SYNC message of which the counter value equals the SYNC start value
shall be regarded as the first received SYNC message. The value shall not be changed while the PDO exists (bit 31 of sub-index 01 h is set to 0 b ).


Index:       0x1a00 - Transmit PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping for the PDO the device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1a01 - Transmit PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping for the PDO the device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1a02 - Transmit PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping for the PDO the device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x1a03 - Transmit PDO Mapping Parameter
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
Description: This object contains the mapping for the PDO the device is able to transmit.

  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 0
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - Mapping Entry 1
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x02 - Mapping Entry 2
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x03 - Mapping Entry 3
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x04 - Mapping Entry 4
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x05 - Mapping Entry 5
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x06 - Mapping Entry 6
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x07 - Mapping Entry 7
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x08 - Mapping Entry 8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  DefaultValue: 0x0000
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   0

Index:       0x2000 - Manufacturer Data
DataType:    UNSIGNED8
ObjectCode:  Record
  Sub:          0x00 - Highest sub-index supported
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  DefaultValue: 7
  AccessType:   ro
  PDOMapping:   0
  Sub:          0x01 - U8
  DataType:     UNSIGNED8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x02 - U16
  DataType:     UNSIGNED16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x03 - U32
  DataType:     UNSIGNED32
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x04 - I8
  DataType:     INTEGER8
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x05 - I16
  DataType:     INTEGER16
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x06 - I32
  DataType:     INTEGER32
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
  Sub:          0x07 - R32
  DataType:     REAL32
  AccessType:   rw
  PDOMapping:   1
